name: catachresis
text: OK word

name: gothfae
text: Ray brings good fortune not only to himself but to his whole community. First maggots, now this.

name: ssddr
text: Ray has a wheel on his remote? He doesnt channel surf, he channel cruises!

name: stuart
text: It's not that unusual. Some Sony remotes have then in lieu of FF/Rewind buttons. My family had about 3 Mitsubishi remotes back in the day that had these little circles for your finger to turn a disc at the bottom with. I can't remember what it did, but I think it was, in fact, for channel cruising.

name: belgand
text: I have one for my old VCR. Not only does the wheel work for moving frame-by-frame, but the spring-loaded collar of the wheel can also be twisted to make it move faster. This is in addition to proper fast forward and rewind buttons.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Wheel remotes are awesome. I wonder if Ray is going to make a rap song called "Trapped in the Dumbwaiter".

name: prufrock
text: For some reason I'd wager that Teodor is the one saying "kill the flashlight"

name: snowman
text: I can't believe I recognized your icon.  I've never even played that game.  I've barely even heard of it.  But, instantly, I was like, "Toejam and Earl."

name: snowman
text: Also:  I agree that it is probably Teodor, but until I read your comment, I 100% assumed it was Lyle.  I have no idea why.  My brain is kind of freaking me out today.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
I thought it was Lyle too!

Get.

Out.

Of.

My.

[i]Braaaaain.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Ugh. And thus I was made to be the bitch of both Assetbar and BBcode, simultaneously.

I am the chick that sucks.

name: butts
text: probably because roast beef said he was with lyle

name: jesler729
text: Oh man Roast Beef can't do even the simplest of things right.

name: pitseleh
text: I love how the alt text totally put my first worry at ease. It's like Onstad is some sort of comic psychic!

name: dasilodavi
text: I want to enjoy this strip, but that maggot waterfall is going to stay with me a bit longer.

name: joestork
text:
Without a doubt my favorite strip

almost had a dang old heart attack...

name: erinye
text:
Beef is not nearly this technologically inept.

But then, he's the guy who sucks, plus he's got depression.

name: tttt2
text: this seems more like a Ray thing to do

name: hereward
text: it is borne out of ray's flamboyant and ridiculous buying tendencies coupled with RB's nervousness under pressure I think.

name: aseidel
text: if I had a nickel for every time I had to make almost this exact phone call...
